thoughts.text: It looks like the get_hyperlinks command returned too much output. I can try using the browse_website command to explore some of the search results instead.
thoughts.reasoning: If one command doesn't work, I can try using another command to achieve the same goal.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the browse_website command to explore some of the search results from the google command.
- Look for fun activities to do in NYC on the related websites.
thoughts.criticism: I should make sure to only visit reputable websites and not click on any suspicious links.
